name: Iridescent Descent
description:
Submission to Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2022

LOG LINE:

Why has the narrator awoken in a room with records on the walls? Is there no one to provide guidance aside from this stranger with a cloud over their face, who says: 

"Haven't you heard music can transport you places?"

CONTENT WARNINGS: 
Can't stand violence or death? Better stay away, okay?

FEATURES:

  • Can you believe the music box has 8 original tracks?
  • Ready to wade your way through 170+ choices?
  • There are only 2 monsters, right? Right?
  • Can you unlock all 5 endings?

CHARACTERS:

THE NARRATOR

Will our esteemed narrator ever find their way home?

THE CLOUD

Why do they answer questions with more questions?

THE MERMAID

Can anyone escape her waters unscathed?

THE SNAIL

Nobody is trying to steal his shell, right?
